Compute rho Conditional Moments on alpha Grid

Source: R/09_weights_rho.R
rho_conditional_grid.Rd

Computes conditional mean and variance of rho on a grid of alpha values. Useful for visualization of how rho varies with alpha.

Usage

rho_conditional_grid(alpha_grid = seq(0.1, 10, length.out = 100))

Arguments

alpha_grid

Numeric vector; grid of alpha values. Default is seq(0.1, 10, length.out = 100).

Value

A data frame with columns:

alpha

Grid points

mean

E(rho | alpha)

var

Var(rho | alpha)

sd

SD(rho | alpha)

Examples

df <- rho_conditional_grid()
plot(df$alpha, df$mean, type = "l",
     xlab = expression(alpha), ylab = expression(E(rho)))
